name: SpaceBros
description:
Space bros is based on space physics

You control a sapce ship and this objective is to destroy your friend's one

Controls :

R : Restart

Player 1 :

Z/W : Thrust

Q/A : Turn left

D : Turn right

X : Shoot

Player 2 :

ArrowUp : Thrust

ArrowLeft : Turn left

ArrowRight : Turn right

Space : Shoot
